channel.title: Sagar Biswas Blog
channel.description: Security awareness posts and engineering reflections by Sagar Biswas.

item.title: Why Attackers Like the Temp Folder and How You Can Protect Your PC | Sagar Biswas
item.description: Why malware often uses the Windows Temp folder, what really happens during these attacks, and practical steps to reduce your risk.

item.title: Understanding OSI Layers Through Real Attack Examples | Sagar Biswas
item.description: A practical OSI model walkthrough that maps each layer to real attack patterns and defensive habits for students and security beginners.

item.title: Quantum Computers vs Encryption | Sagar Biswas
item.description: Quantum computers threaten current RSA and ECC encryption. NIST's post-quantum standards exist today. Learn what organizations should do now.

item.title: Anonymity Isn’t Absolute: What Works | Sagar Biswas
item.description: Nation-state actors can correlate metadata and behavior. VPNs and proxies help, but real anonymity depends on identity separation, fewer actions, and avoiding linking accounts.

item.title: Full‑Page Screenshot in DevTools | Sagar Biswas
item.description: A fast DevTools trick to capture a full-page screenshot in Chrome/Edge. No extensions, no hassle—just the Command Menu.

item.title: Printer Attack: The Silent Entry Point | Sagar Biswas
item.description: How a printer can become the easiest entry point into a company network — and how to secure it before attackers do.

item.title: Vibe Coding: টেক ডেবট কেন বাড়ে | Sagar Biswas
item.description: AI দিয়ে দ্রুত ডেলিভারি সম্ভব, কিন্তু ভুল সিদ্ধান্তে তৈরি হয় বাড়তি জটিলতা। কী রাখবেন, কী বাদ দেবেন — এই লেখায় আছে সহজ ব্যাখ্যা।

item.title: Wi‑Fi Security Alert: MAC Blocking Isn’t Enough
item.description: Blocking a device by MAC address is easy to bypass on modern phones. Learn the safer, fast fix: change your Wi‑Fi password and tighten router settings.

item.title: WSL2 + Kali + Win‑KeX Guide | Sagar Biswas
item.description: A notebook-style, beginner-friendly WSL2 + Kali Linux + Win‑KeX setup guide with exact commands, prompt answers, screenshots, and fixes.
